alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Smoke Advisory issued July 14 at 3:18PM MDT until July 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FORT PECK LAKE... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. For the Dense Smoke Advisory, visibility as low as 2 miles at times in smoke. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Garfield and McCone Counties. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 9 PM MDT this evening. For the Dense Smoke Advisory, until 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Air quality will be reduced into the unhealthy (red) or unhealthy for sensitive groups (orange) categories.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. Persons with respiratory illnesses should remain indoors to avoid inhaling smoke. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone
